data.text:
WEBSITE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE

MercyOne Centerville Medical Center is part of Catholic Health Initiatives (CHI), a national not-for-profit health organization with headquarters in Englewood, Colo.

USE OF THIS SITE AND ANY RELATED SERVICES ARE SUBJECT TO YOUR COMPLIANCE WITH THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH BELOW. PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION CAREFULLY, YOUR CONTINUED USE OF THIS SITE INDICATES YOUR AGREEMENT TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS. IF OU DO NOT AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS, PROMPTLY EXIT THIS SITE.

Overview

This web site (the “Site”) contains pages and materials made available for download and viewing by Catholic Health Initiatives (“CHI”), by individual members (“Members”) of the Site, and by advertisers, sponsors and other content contributors (“Content Contributors”). Portions of the Site authored by CHI or its authorized agents, contractors, and employees are referred to herein as “CHI Materials.” Portions of the Site authored by Members are referred to herein as “Member Materials.” Portions of the Site authored by other Content Contributors are referred to herein as “Third Party Materials.”

Use of CHI Materials

All CHI Materials on the Site are protected by federal and international copyright and trademark laws and are the property of CHI and/or its affiliates. No portion of the CHI Materials may be reprinted, republished, modified, reproduced, or distributed in any form without the express written permission of CHI.

You may view or download CHI Materials for your own personal use. You shall keep intact any proprietary notices, including copyright notices, contained on ay downloaded CHI Materials and you shall comply with any applicable end user license agreements. With respect to CHI Materials, any rights not expressly granted by these Terms and Conditions or any applicable end user license agreements are reserved by CHI.

Accuracy of CHI Materials

Although CHI attempts to ensure the integrity and accurateness of the CHI Materials, it makes no guarantees whatsoever as to their correctness or accuracy. It is possible that the CHI Materials could include inaccuracies or errors, and that unauthorized additions, deletions and alterations could be made to these materials by third parties. In the event that an inaccuracy arises, please inform CHI so that it can be addressed. Information contained on the Site may be changed or updated without notice.

Use of Member Materials and Third Party Material

All Member Materials and Third Party Materials on the Site are the responsibility of their respective authors, creators, and/or owners. CHI is not responsible for Member Materials and Third Party Materials, and the views and opinions expressed in Member Materials and Third Party Materials are not necessarily those of CHI or its affiliates. CHI cannot, and does not, review Member Materials or Third Party Materials before they are made accessible through the Site.

Nevertheless, please be advised that Member Materials and Third Party Materials may be protected by federal and international copyright or other laws, and your right to reprint, republish, modify, reproduce, or distribute Member Materials or Third Party Materials may be limited accordingly.

Warranty Disclaimer

THIS SITE, INCLUDING ANY CONTENT OR INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN OR ANY SITE-RELATED SERVICE, IS PROVIDED “AS IS,” WITH NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMIED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NONINFRINGEMENT. YOU ASSUME TOTAL RESPONSIBILITY AND RISK FOR YOUR USE OF THIS SITE, SITE-RELATED SERVICES, AND ANY HYPERLINKED WEB SITES. NOTHING CONTAINED IN THE SITE IS INTENDED TO BE ISNTRUCTIONAL FOR MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS OR TREATMENT.

THE INFORMATION SHOULD NOT BE CONSIDERED COMLETE, NORT SHOULD IT BE RELIED ON TO SUGGEST A COURSE OF TREATMENT FOR A PARTICULAR INDIVIDUAL. IT SHOULD NOT BE USED IN PLACE OF A VISIT, CALL, CONSULTATION OR THE ADVICE OF YOR PHYSICIAN OR OTHER QUALIFIED HEALTH CARE PROIDER. INFORMATION INCLUDED IN THE SITE IS NOT EXHAUSTIVE AND DOES NOT COVER ALL DISEASES, AILMENTS, PHYSICAL CONDITIONS OR THEIR TREATMENT. SHOULD YOU HAVE ANY HEALTH CARE RELATED QUESTIONS, CALL OR SEE YOUR PHYSICIAN OR OTHER QUALIFIED HEALTH CARE PROVIDER PROMPTLY.

ALWAYS CONSULT WITH YOUR PHYSICIAN OR OTHER QUALIFIED HEALTH CARE PROVIDER BEFORE EMBARKING ON A NEW TREATMENT, DIET OR FITNESS PROGRAM. YOU SHOULD NEVER DISREGARD MEDICAL ADVICE OR DELAY IN SEEKING IT BECAUSE OF SOMETHING YOU HAVE READ IN THE SITE. THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IN THE SITE IS COMPILED FROM A VARIETY OF SOURCES (“INFORMATION PROVIDERS”). NEITHER CHI NOR INFORMATION PROVIDERS DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY PRACTICE MEDICINE OR DISPENSE MEDICAL SERVICES AS PART OF THE SITE.

THE SITE MAY CONTAIN HEALTH OR MEDICAL RELATED MATERIALS WHICH YOU FIND SEXUALLY EXPLICIT OR OTHERWISE OFFENSIVE. BOWERS ACCEPTS NO RESPONSIBILITY FOR SUCH MATERIALS, AND USE OF THE SITE IS AT YOUR OWN RISK. CHI, ITS AFFILIATES AND ITS SPONSORS ARE NEITHER RESPONSIBLE NOR LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, PUNITIVE, OR OTHER DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING IN ANY WAY TO THIS SITE, SITE-RELATED SERVICES, CONTENT OR INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN, OR ANY HYPERLINKED WEB SITE.

YOUR SOLE REMEDY FOR DISSATISFACTION WITH THE SITE, SITE-RELATED SERVICES, CONTENT OR INFORMATION CONTAINED HERE, AND/OR HYPERLINKED WEB SITES IS TO STOP USING THE SITE, SITE-RELATED SERVICES, CONTENT OR INFORMATION, OR HYPERLINKED WEB SITES.

Trademark Notice

This site includes numerous trademarks and service marks which are the property of CHI such as “CATHOLIC HEALTH INITIATIVES,”A SPIRIT OF INNOVATION, A LEGACY OF CARE”. Other trademarks, service marks and logos used in this Site are the trademarks, service marks or logos of third parties.

Infringement

It is CHI’s policy to respect the intellectual property of others and to respond quickly to notices of alleged infringement. CHI will terminate the access of all Members who repeatedly infringe the intellectual property rights of others. Likewise, any apparent infringement of CHI’s intellectual property rights by one of its Members will result in the immediate termination of that Member’s access to the Site.

If CHI removes or disables access to Member Materials or Third Party Materials according to these Terms and Conditions, CHI may, in its discretion, provide the Member or Contract Contributor with a copy of the notification which prompted removal or disabled access to the Member Materials or Third Party Materials. However, CHI reserves the right to withhold access to and/or not replace the Member Materials or Third Party Materials unless ordered to do so by a court or other tribunal of competent jurisdiction.

Other Web Sites

CHI makes no representations whatsoever about any other web site that you may access through this Site. When you access a non-CHI web site, please understand that it is independent from CHI, and that CHI has no control over the content on that web site. In addition, a hyperlink to a non-CHI web site does not mean that CHI endorses or accepts any responsibility for the content, or the use, of a linked site.

It is up to you to take precautions to ensure that whatever you select for your use or download from that site is free of such items as viruses, worms, Trojan horses, and other items of a destructive nature, and that such use or download complies with copyright and other applicable laws.

Choice of Law and Venue

These terms and Conditions are entered into in the State of Colorado, U.S.A., and shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Colorado, U.S.A., exclusive of its choice of law rules. Each part to these Terms and Conditions submits to the exclusive jurisdiction of the state and federal courts sitting in the County of Denver in the State of Colorado, U.S.A. and waives any jurisdictional, venue, or inconvenient forum objections to such courts.

In any action to enforce these Terms and Conditions, the prevailing party will be entitled to costs and attorney’s fees. In the event that any of the Terms and Conditions are held by a court or other tribunal of competent jurisdiction to be unenforceable, such provisions shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that these Terms and Conditions shall otherwise remain in full force and effect.

Entire Agreement

These Terms and Conditions constitute the entire agreement between CHI and you pertaining to the subject matter hereof. In its sole discretion, CHI may modify these Terms and Conditions by posting the revised version on this Site.

No Unlawful or Prohibited Purpose

As a condition of your use of this Site, you warrant to CHI that you will not use the Site for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms and Conditions. If CHI is informed that you are making a possibly unlawful or prohibited use of the Site, CHI may unilaterally deny your further access to the Site or any portion thereof.

USE OF THIS SITE AND ANY RELATED SERVICES ARE SUBJECT TO YOUR COMPLIANCE WITH THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH ABOVE. PLEASE READ THIS INFORMATION CAREFULLY. YOUR CONTINUED USE OF THIS SITE INDICATES YOUR AGREEMENT TO BE BOUND BY THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH ABOVE. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS, PROMPTLY EXIT SITE.
